MILITARY AIR TRANSPORT SERVICE
UNITED STATES AIR FORCE
Washington 25, D. C.
AIR WEATHER SERVICE
HEADQUARTERS
7 November 19$$
Dr* Frank Schooley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
liÂ± Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr* Schooley:
Since it has been some time since I have written to you, I
thought you would be interested in knowing that we are nearly
ready to commence work on our educational series*
When we complete our pilot tape for NAEB we shall send it
on to you for audition by your program committee.
I shall contact you when the tape is ready .for your
perusal* Again, thank you for your interest.
Sincerely,
RICHARD L. SPMRS
2nd Lt., USAF
Chief, Radio-TV Branch
Office Information Services
